remarks: A filter has the same convergence and clustering properties as some net.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 12-Dec-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Aug-2015.)
statement:
filnet $p |- ( F e. ( Fil ` X ) -> E. d e. DirRel E. f ( f : dom d --> X /\ F = ( ( X FilMap f ) ` ran ( tail ` d ) ) ) ) $.
$d F d f $.
$d X d f $.
$d d f $.
$d d f $.
